comment.author: 84575910@N06
comment._content: ... tho i was not anywhere near the holocaust & tho i am not of a religious sect.  i do find the persecution put upon the jewish people @ the satanic hands of the nazi(s) so atrocious.  it was not only the jewish people ; gypsy & others were targeted, also.  i am not a historian.  i am a humanitarian.  any genocide is an act (hateful) against the spirit of life which i say ... is "god".  the spirit of life is god.
